name: Curry Hurry
description:
Hungry salarymen are approaching your food truck, but you forgot to prepare your signature curry rice! How many can you feed before the lunchtime rush ends?

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move and interact with customers, objects in your food truck.
  • Crank (or mouse scroll wheel) when prompted to stir the pot.

A little game made for Pulp Jam 1, using Pulp. Game length is around 5 minutes.
